Text.Page:
Excuse me, noble Angler. Can you spare some time for a poor fisherpopori down on his luck?

I was hoping to start a new career in fishing, but I don't seem to be any good at it. I can't even catch enough to make some Fish Fritters for lunch.

Can you help me?
<PCNAME> met Paparong at the Lake of Tears Fishery and helped him catch fish to feed his family.

Wow! you're so kind. I love Fish Fritters, they're so crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside!

I feel energized, but I'm afraid my fishing skills aren't high enough to provide for my family

I hate to impose, but could you catch some fish for me so I can at least have something to show for today?

Even though I'm no great shakes as an angler, I'm a fairly good merchant and can make it worth your while."You can count on me."

Have you ever heard of a Freshwater Eel?

It's a favorite in my house! If I can take two Freshwater Eels home, my family will forgive me for being gone all day.

You can catch them here at the Lake of Tears Fishery, but you have to use the right kind of rod and bait.
May the Goddess bless you! Now I can go home! I promise to tell my family the truth...after dinner.

Did you catch the eels?

You may have to experiment with rods and bait to catch them. Genn over there said they were a "Grade 4" fish, whatever that means.
